mapper.insert: insert into reply(mem_id, post_id, rpl_content, rpl_datetime,rpl_updated_datetime,rpl_ip) values(#{sessionid},#{post_id},#{replycontent},sysdate(),now(),now())
mapper.select: select * from reply where rpl_id > 0 and post_id = #{post_id} and rpl_del = 0 order by rpl_id desc limit #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.perPageNum}
select count(rpl_id) as cnt from reply where rpl_del = 0 and post_id = #{post_id}
select * from reply where post_id = #{post_id} and rpl_del = 0;
